body_html: Meanwhile, you guys could at least print a warning, raise an exception, deprecate this API, or add a line to the documentation. I do like Tensorflow, and I think you are doing a great job, but for people outside Google it is often very unclear which ops are "mostly deprecated" in favor of which.

body: Meanwhile, you guys could at least print a warning, raise an exception, deprecate this API, or add a line to the documentation. I do like Tensorflow, and I think you are doing a great job, but for people outside Google it is often very unclear which ops are "mostly deprecated" in favor of which.
